table.searchTemplate: eventtype="mssharepoint-inventory" Type="FeatureDefinition"|lookup Farm_lookup.csv FarmId OUTPUT FarmName|table DisplayName,FarmName,RootDirectory,Scope,Status,ActivateOnDefault
table.title: Feature ID Usage

table.searchTemplate: eventtype="mssharepoint-iis" |stats dc(cs_uri_stem) as "# Pages" by cs_username |rename cs_username as "User"
table.title: User ID Usage
